+package io.micronaut.core.util;
+
+import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
+import io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered;
+
+import java.util.Locale;
+import java.util.Optional;
+
+/**
+ * Responsible for determining the current locale given a context.
+ *
+ * @author James Kleeh
+ * @since 2.3.0
+ */
+public interface LocaleResolver<T> extends Ordered {
+
+    /**
+     * Resolves the locale for the given context.
+     *
+     * @param context The context to retrieve the locale from
+     * @return The locale
+     */
+    Optional<Locale> resolve(@NonNull T context);
+
+    Locale resolveOrDefault(@NonNull T context);

timeline.bodyText: Missing javadoc. Should this be public? Does it need to be an additional bean? Can it be registered programmatically in DefaultRequestBinderRegistry
timeline.author: graemerocher

replies.bodyText:
@jameskleeh what about this part of the comment:

Should this be public? Does it need to be an additional bean? Can it be registered programmatically in DefaultRequestBinderRegistry
replies.author: sdelamo

replies.bodyText: It should be an additional bean so we don't need to tie the dependency on locale resolver to the binder registry
replies.author: jameskleeh

timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: Should be annotated with @Indexed(HttpLocalResolver.class) since there can be multiple
timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: I will add @NonNull to the return type.

replies.bodyText: I don't think thats necessary in a config props class
replies.author: jameskleeh

replies.bodyText: It is not necessary. But I think we should try to mark nullability with @NonNull and @Nullable as much as possible going forward. It helps us with IDE, it help us with Kotlin, it helps us preventing NPE.
replies.author: sdelamo

timeline.bodyText: I think we have to order the localeResolvers with OrderUtil.sort(localeResolvers); before assigning them.

replies.bodyText: It's not repeated for the fixed resolver. I don't think this warrants an abstract class

timeline.message:
refactor: changes to locale resolver (#4727)

* refactor: changes to locale resolver

* :%s/DefaultLocaleResolver/AbstractLocaleResolver

* add a padding to fixed locale resolver

* don't sort locale resolvers they are already sorted

* remove @Indexed

* don't override getOrder in Composite

* make test more robust for ordering

* don't extend FixedLocaleResolver from AbstractLocaleResolver

* Split default and fix configuration

timeline.author: sdelamo
sdelamo
